definition: to select/to choose/to pick over/to pick out/to differentiate/to eliminate/also pr. [zhai2]

sentences.english: In most browsers to select one paragraph at a time, triple-click on it.
sentences.chinese: 在大多數瀏覽器中，三擊以選擇段落。

sentences.english: The script could be improved by displaying the picks in a Keno-style board.
sentences.chinese: 可以通過在基諾樣式板中顯示選擇結果來改進腳本。

sentences.english: Yang Lei's mother supported her daughter's decision.
sentences.chinese: 楊雷的媽媽支持她女兒的選擇。

sentences.english: Reading is good, but we have to choose what to read.
sentences.chinese: 讀書是一好事，但我們必須多加註意書的選擇。

sentences.english: Their drug of choice was a potent intoxicant they called hashish.
sentences.chinese: 他們選擇的是一種他們稱爲“黑煞”的烈性麻醉劑。

sentences.english: If time is not pressing, sieges or neutralization will be likely options of choice.
sentences.chinese: 假按時分沒有平靜，也能夠或許選擇圍攻或水力壓抑。

sentences.english: It is an inevitable choice to develop the strategy of famous brand for an enterprise in the keen market competitions.
sentences.chinese: 實施名牌戰略是企業在激烈的市場競爭中的必然選擇。

sentences.english: In addition, the number of the zenith delay parameters has effect on the tropospheric refraction.
sentences.chinese: 天頂延遲參數個數的選擇對對流層折射有較大影響。

sentences.english: Factor in all the schools you’re applying to and any back-up options.
sentences.chinese: 考慮你所有申請的學校和後備選擇。

sentences.english: Steven Kennard:What are the requirements for ABP choosing international partners?
sentences.chinese: 總部基地在全球選擇合作伙伴都有哪些要求？

sentences.english: Obstinately he clung to his choice.
One in 3 domestic passengers chooses China Southern Airlines on average.
sentences.chinese: 中國平均每3個民航旅客就有1個選擇南航。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the clinical characteristics and treatment options of cutaneous vessel abnormalities.
sentences.chinese: 目的總結兒童皮膚脈管異常的臨牀特點和治療選擇。

sentences.english: Why on earth have Man Booker's publicists chosen the Groucho?
sentences.chinese: 布克獎的那些公關爲什麼會選擇格勞喬這個鬼地方？

sentences.english: Billions years ago, human had moved from ocean to land and dominated the earth;
sentences.chinese: 億萬年後人從陸地走向森林，選擇水岸。

sentences.english: You can choose the mode from the Oculus Configuration Utility's Rift Display Mode screen.
sentences.chinese: 你可以選擇應用程序的屏幕顯示模式。

definition: only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
to decide (to do something)/to resolve/decision/CL:個|个[ge4],項|项[xiang4]/certainly
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
